oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Full plate tintype of Samuel Bobo
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Full plate tintype of Samuel Bobo with full chin beard. Bobo was born in Flat Creek, Bedford County (Tenn." on September 28,1815. He died on June 18, 1891, in Lincoln County (Tenn." now Moore County (Tenn." He married Cyrrenneus R. Simpson in 1833. He appears to have been exempted from military service, however, records from the Confederate Quatermaster Dept. indicate that Bobo sold supplies throughout the winter of 1862-63 including corn, fodder, salt pork, and lard.
